homeAbout.heading: Since 1994, Curating Indonesia's Finest Premium Carpets
homeAbout.paragraph1: With more than three decades of experience, Al-Jabbar Carpets stands among Indonesia's most trusted destinations for premium carpets and permadani.
homeAbout.paragraph2: Every piece in our collection is handpicked from world-renowned artisans and manufacturers across Iran, Turkey, Pakistan, Afghanistan, Kashmir, Europe, and the United States.

point1.title: 26+ Years of Expertise
point1.description: A generational legacy in crafting and curating premium carpets.

point2.title: 9 Showrooms Across Indonesia
point2.description: Providing a seamless shopping experience wherever you are.

point3.title: 10,000+ Rugs Curated
point3.description: A diverse and carefully selected collection for every interior style.

point4.title: 5,090+ Happy Customers
point4.description: A proven track record of quality and satisfaction.

point5.title: Premium Quality
point5.description: We offer only the finest materials and designs to elevate your living space.

point6.title: Approachable & Trusted
point6.description: Fast, friendly assistance and decades of reliability you can count on.

bannerCTA.subHeading: Our team is available 9 AM – 9 PM daily to guide you through styles, materials, and interior matching.

visionMision.vision: To become a global market leader in premium carpets.
visionMision.mision: To bring high-quality carpets into the homes, offices, and places of worship of our.

aboutUs.title: About Al-Jabbar Carpets
aboutUs.subTitle: Al-Jabbar Carpets has been established since 1994 as a trusted curator of premium carpets sourced directly from their countries of origin.
aboutUs.heading: Since 1994, Curating Indonesia’s Finest Premium Carpets
aboutUs.paragraph1: Al-Jabbar Carpets has been established since 1994 as a trusted curator of premium carpets sourced directly from their countries of origin.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our collection includes hand-made carpets from Iran, Pakistan, Afghanistan, and Kashmir; machine-made rugs from Turkey and Iran; as well as mosque carpets, sajadah, and wall-to-wall carpets from Europe and the United States.
aboutUs.paragraph3: We believe a carpet is the centerpiece that brings life, warmth, and character into a room.
aboutUs.paragraph4: That is why every piece we curate meets a strict standard of quality, authentic craftsmanship, and timeless design.
aboutUs.paragraph5: In addition to our showrooms, we also offer a complimentary Home Trial Service, we bring selected carpets to your home and help you find the one that fits your interior perfectly.

counterSection.heading: The Numbers That Define Us
counterSection.subHeading: A snapshot of our legacy through key performance milestones.

faqs.subTitle: We've gathered some of the most frequently asked questions so you can get answers faster.
faqs.miniText: If you haven't found the answer, please [contact us](/contact) directly.

one.question: You have more questions?
one.answer: Please don't hesitate to contact us on [WhatsApp](whatsapp).

two.question: How does a hand-made carpet differ from a machine-made carpet?
two.answer:
There are numerous differences but some of the main ones are: 

Handmade carpets are one-off unique whereas machine made carpets are available in bulk. 

Hand-made carpets material has original wool or silk and sometimes a mix of both depending on the carpet but a machine-made carpets material is synthetic. 

Hand-made carpets are made by hand therefore guaranteeing exquisite detail and are labor-intensive whereas machine made carpets are made by machines and are capital-intensive.

three.question: How often do I need to clean my carpet?
three.answer: Just vacuum the carpet monthly once a week. Also, if it gets too dirty Al-Jabbar does provide washing services. Click our [services](/service) to find out more.

four.question: Does Al-Jabbar provide the service or washing and repairing carpets?
four.answer: Yes, we definitely do! Please go to our [services](/service) page to find out more about it.

five.question: I want to inquire about carpets who should I contact?
five.answer: You can go to our [collections](/collections) page where there will be a WhatsApp number which you can contact for any detail on the carpets.

ourServices.title: Our Services
ourServices.subTitle: Premium services dedicated to maintaining and  preserving your carpets quality.
ourServices.subHeading1: This is the service we provide for shaft roll and wall to wall carpets. We measure it according to your place and install the carpet and there is no charge for this considering you have bought from Al-Jabbar Carpets.
ourServices.subHeading2: When we send the carpet for washing to laundry due to the chemicals used and no proper care given the carpet loses its beautiful natural color. At Al-Jabbar we have trained specialized people that wash the carpets. Understanding this issue Al-Jabbar provides the service of carpet washing
ourServices.subHeading3: At Al-Jabbar Carpets we also repair your carpets. Please contact us for further inquiry/information at our WhatsApp number.
